item.title: [Delta]Clickable Commands in Quest List[/Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Motokid126 Motokid126
item.description:
@Motokid126 wrote:

[quote=“Berky-Scape, post:7, topic:335520”][quote author=tehjamdude link=topic=431900.msg3172051#msg3172051 date=1270515016]

I’m using the exact same server base as you and it doesn’t work, well it does to a point.

The quests will not go away, when i click rune mysteries after i did what you did the command worked, but the quests did not go away, and i did exactly as you said…

Did you compile the client and server, If you didn’t it took the information for the compiled… .class file.

good compilers are easy to make.
[/quote]
Who said teh michaelz used a delta it is just a client, which people use to play deltas on.[/quote]

Meh idk Berky

Something i did was wrong, i guess…

I mean it works, the very first quest up there spawns the food, but the quests never did disappear >.>

Read full topic
